function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Temporary use of green spaces for hospitals","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread in green spaces","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning and disinfection of temporary hospital sites","Technologies":"Disinfection equipment, UV disinfection technology","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors","Owner":"Healthcare facilities, local government"},{"Description":"Temporary road closures and changes to urban infrastructure","Impact":"Potential increase in pedestrian and cyclist accidents due to unfamiliar road layouts","Mitigation":"Public education on new road layouts, clear signage, and traffic management measures","Technologies":"Smart traffic management systems, road signage technology","People":"Pedestrians, cyclists, drivers","Owner":"Local government, transportation authorities"},{"Description":"Reduction in noise and air pollution during lockdown","Impact":"Potential return of pollution and noise levels post-lockdown","Mitigation":"Implementation of sustainable urban planning and pollution control measures","Technologies":"Green infrastructure, air quality monitoring technology","People":"City residents, vulnerable populations","Owner":"City government, environmental agencies"}]}
